content: Will there be a SMART track on the Connectathon 30 in May?
We don't currently have a track proposed. If someone in the community is interested in leading this, I'd be very happy to mentor!
(Technically the deadlines are past, but we can take that up in #fmg , so don't let that dissuade you.)

Thanks @Josh Mandel!
I'm leading the International Patient Access track and were just wondering whether I should add SMART as a related track (as I did last time). I personally won't have the capacity to lead a SMART track in addition to IPA. I will join and test my apps, though, if someone else picks up the role of the track lead.

I can now see several SMART App Launch v2 sessions on the session capture page, but don't yet see such a track on the connectathon main page. But it seems a track will be there? @Mike Ward @Geoff Low @Jean Duteau are listed as speakers.

Or is this just a Vulcan SOA track that has been tagged as SMART v2 for some reason?
image.png
copy-paste error? :noodles:

Actually, I think quite a many of the sessions have been messed up, including IPA ones...
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179207-connectathon-mgmt/topic/Sessions.20missing.20from.20Session.20Capture/near/275858946
